inputs.remark:
V1 修改： history.noise_exposure_history: "Police officer (likely occupational exposure, though not explicitly detailed in history text)" → "Police officer; occupational noise exposure likely (firing range)"
缺少 V2（耳科随访）和V3（MRI）和V4（治疗）和V5（计划随访）

logic_summary: Updated V1 noise exposure history to explicitly mention 'firing range' as requested.
Added V2 (Otology follow-up) on 2016-08-13 (day after V1).
Added V3 (MRI) in August 2016 confirming vestibular schwannoma.
Added V4 (Gamma Knife Surgery) in August 2016.
Added V5 (Planned Follow-up) for February 2017 including VRT referral.

patch_ops.value: Police officer; occupational noise exposure likely (firing range)

history.present_illness: Follow-up to review audiologic and VNG findings.

value.management: Ordered MRI of internal auditory canals with and without contrast.

tests.name: MRI Internal Auditory Canals
tests.key_findings: Small 6-mm vestibular schwannoma within the right internal auditory canal protruding into the cerebellopontine angle and pressing on the seventh (facial) and eighth (vestibulocochlear) cranial nerves.

value.management: Gamma knife radiosurgery performed (2 days after MRI) to stunt tumor growth.
Scheduled 6-month follow-up audiometric evaluation. Referred for Vestibular Rehabilitation Therapy (VRT).
